Items.Description: Split pea soup served with crusty baguette and salted butter
King prawns served with 5-spice cocktail sauce
Portobello mushrooms stuffed with a selection of herbs and cheeses
Unlimited refills of Pepsi, 7 Up, Schweppes, and Irn Bru
Choice of Strawberry, Chocolate, Banana, and Butterscotch malted milkshakes
Aberdeen Angus burger topped with haggis and whisky sauce. Served with side of home-style chips and salad (with dressing)
Venison steak with Bleu cheese and crispy shallots. Served with side of home-style chips, salad (with dressing), and cranberry sauce
Two quarter pounders accompanied by cheese, grilled onion, pickles, tomato, lettuce topped with choice of relish or mustard. Served with fries
A hot, rich curry made with green chillies, peppers, onion and tomatoes. Served with pilau rice, naan, and poppadom
A mild but flavorful dish made with ground almonds, coconut and thick cream. Served with pilau rice, naan, and poppadom
Rich and creamy sauce with aromatic chicken pieces. Served with pilau rice, naan, and poppadom
Fresh beer-battered north sea cod on a bed of chunky chips, served with side of tartare sauce.
Tenderloin beef coated in pâté de foie gras and duxelles, baked in puff pastry. Accompanied by rich gravy and roast potatoes
Decadent chocolate Bombe glacée drizzled with toffee sauce and served with black forest fruit compote
Rich, dense, and creamy cheesecake topped with a red berry and vanilla glaze
Hot banoffee pie with a buttery biscuit base complimented by choice of ice cream, cream, or custard
Neopolitan ice cream sandwiched between two bananas topped with crushed nuts and whipped cream drizzled in sauce complete with Maraschino cherry
Traditional crumble with Apple, Rhubarb, and Plum filling. Flanked by choice of ice cream, cream, or custard
Rich chocolate sponge with dark chocolate fudge frosting
Various crackers with cheese selection including Y Fenni, Duddleswell, Red Windsor, and Keltic Gold
